testCases.label: Verify a new map is created successfully
testCases.description: Checks that createMap() returns a non-null Map instance.

testCases.label: Verify a new map starts with size 0
testCases.description: Checks that getSize() returns 0 when called on a newly created, empty map.

testCases.label: Verify inserting one entry updates map size to 1
testCases.description: Adds one key–value pair with addKeyValuePair() and verifies getSize() returns 1.

testCases.label: Verify value can be retrieved by key after insertion
testCases.description: Inserts a single key–value pair and verifies getValueFromKey() returns the expected value for that key.

testCases.label: Verify multiple inserted entries are all retrievable
testCases.description: Inserts two key–value pairs and verifies getValueFromKey() returns the correct values for both keys.

testCases.label: Verify removing a key–value pair makes the key inaccessible
testCases.description: Inserts two key–value pairs, removes one using removeKeyValuePair(), and verifies the removed key is no longer present in the map.

testCases.label: Verify overwriting a value updates the value for an existing key
testCases.description: Inserts two key–value pairs, overwrites the value for one key with overwriteValue(), and verifies the new value is returned when accessed by that key.
